main.name: David Pérez Daher
main.description: My experience in software development ranges from automotive systems to automation tools and chatbots.
main.bio: I am a computer systems engineer from Guadalajara, Mexico. I love dogs, music, playing guitar, and of course, software development. I am currently sharpening my React skills to steer my career path towards front-end development.

work.title: A. I. Knowledge Base Specialist
work.description: Formed part of a multinational SaaS startup that developed a virtual assistant and product supply/value chain platform. I created customized knowledge bases leveraging an artificial intelligence platform that was part of the conversational service of the virtual assistant. I reported, monitored, and managed issues through JIRA.

work.title: Software/Data Engineer
work.description: Software development and data engineering for the crop science division of Bayer. I revamped the purchasing and acquisition process from a manual form to a fully-fledged application with a dashboard, approval system and notifications. I also gathered data on agricultural operations to create seasonal forecasts.

work.title: Software Quality Manager
work.description: Software QA auditing and process automation for advanced driving assistance systems. I evaluated function, performance, and design compliance of software systems against ASPICE quality standards and customer needs. I Developed automation scripts for QA processes, gathered data on software issues and reported findings and recommendations.
